title: Inferior Magic Swordsman: Using the Skill Board to Become the Strongest - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Martial Arts   Mystery   Romance
tags: Accelerated Growth   Adapted to Manga   Adventurers   Age Regression   Beautiful Female Lead   Death of Loved Ones   Demons   Dungeons   Elves   Goddesses   Lack of Common Sense   Level System   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Male Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   R-15   Reincarnated in Another World   Skill Assimilation   Strong to Stronger   Sudden Strength Gain   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   Weak to Strong
author: Hagiu Aki   萩鵜アキ
description: A normal office worker, Toru Minasuki, was swallowed up by a dimensional fissure and reincarnated into a different world. Upon reincarnation, Toru was given a [skill board] by God. Make the most of it to acquire all the necessary skills! Even though he is an 'inferior person,' he'll make his way to the top!>
